mapper.select: SELECT l.lawfirm_name, p.lawyer_id, p.lawyer_name, p.lawyer_tel, p.lawyer_exam, p.lawyer_exam_num, p.lawyer_acq_year, p.lawyer_area, p.lawyer_liked FROM follaw.lawyers p INNER JOIN follaw.lawfirms l ON l.lawfirm_idx = p.lawfirm_idx WHERE p.lawyer_premium_date = 0 OR p.lawyer_premium_date IS NULL;

SELECT l.lawfirm_name, p.lawyer_id, p.lawyer_name, p.lawyer_tel, p.lawyer_exam, p.lawyer_exam_num, p.lawyer_acq_year, p.lawyer_area, p.lawyer_liked FROM follaw.lawyers p INNER JOIN follaw.lawfirms l ON l.lawfirm_idx = p.lawfirm_idx WHERE p.lawyer_premium_date >= 1;
